duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and support the processing of financial disclosures for new entrants, annual reports, and terminations in compliance with federal regulations.
Maintain and update OGE Form 450, OGE Form 278, and OGE Form 278-Ts for completeness and accuracy within specified timeframes.
Prepare and provide drafts of annual notifications and reminders for review by the Office of General Counsel prior to distribution.
Assist with the filing and processing of Special Government Employee (SGE) information and support Ethics Program Tracking Systems (EPTS).
Facilitate communication with NASA employees, providing technical and general assistance related to financial disclosure filings.
Perform other duties as assigned by management.
